name: The Desert Will Guide You Home (I)
achievementgroup: Sumeru: The Gilded Desert - Series I

stage1.title: The Desert Will Guide You Home (I)
stage1.description: Follow 10 Seelie to their Seelie Courts in Hypostyle Desert, Land of Upper Setekh, and Land of Lower Setekh.

stage2.title: The Desert Will Guide You Home (I)
stage2.description: Follow 20 Seelie to their Seelie Courts in Hypostyle Desert, Land of Upper Setekh, and Land of Lower Setekh.

stage3.title: The Desert Will Guide You Home (I)
stage3.description: Follow 40 Seelie to their Seelie Courts in Hypostyle Desert, Land of Upper Setekh, and Land of Lower Setekh.
